tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE camera_calibration (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_model VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_width FLOAT,
    sensor_height FLOAT,
    focal_length FLOAT,
    principal_point_x FLOAT,
    principal_point_y FLOAT,
    distortion_coefficients VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE camera_calibration_parameters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    focal_length DOUBLE PRECISION,
    principal_point_x DOUBLE PRECISION,
    principal_point_y DOUBLE PRECISION,
    distortion_coefficients VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE camera_calibrations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fx FLOAT,
    fy FLOAT,
    cx FLOAT,
    cy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE distortion_coefficients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    k1 FLOAT,
    k2 FLOAT,
    k3 FLOAT,
    p1 FLOAT,
    p2 FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE CameraParameters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fx FLOAT,
    fy FLOAT,
    cx FLOAT,
    cy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DistortionParameters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    k1 FLOAT,
    k2 FLOAT,
    k3 FLOAT,
    p1 FLOAT,
    p2 FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE CalibrationHistory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    calibration_date DATE,
    calibration_type VARCHAR(50),
    calibration_accuracy FLOAT,
    camera_id INT
);
